thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Lynn G
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Lynn G

author: Lynn G
title: Lynn G
text: I had the opportunity to shop both online and in-store with this shop, the experience was flawless and effortless . The attention to care by a lady named Mandy and her team was amazing from phone calls to online to the amazing presentation in which the products arrived. Could not fault this experience in any way and this even included returning/exchanging an item online. Outstanding shopping experience would reccommend to all of all ages and also will most definitely continue to use this service.
